report.title: UKBMS Visit Summary list
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for user, date start and end.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN occurrences o ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id AND o.deleted = false AND #website_filter# JOIN samples s ON o.sample_id=s.id and s.deleted=false JOIN samples p ON s.parent_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false AND (((trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here') AND p.date_end >= CAST(extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-01-01' as date)) OR (trim('#date_from#')<>'' AND '#date_from#'<>'Click here' AND p.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))) AND (((trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here') AND p.date_start <= CAST(extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-12-31' as date)) OR (trim('#date_to#')<>'' AND '#date_to#'<>'Click here' AND p.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))) JOIN locations l ON p.location_id = l.id AND l.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE (CAST(p.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#' OR '#user_id#' = '') AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR ctt.term='#location_type_id#') AND #website_filter#

param.name: date_from
param.description: If not provided, defaults to the start of the current year

param.name: date_to
param.description: If not provided, defaults to the end of the current year

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user, or leave blank for all users
